entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: -2.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this morning. Snow mixed with rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 10 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to 10 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to a few flurries near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the morning then becoming north 40 gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
